details: Created a bundled changelog data file and modal so players can review product updates from the account bar.

summary: Polished the interface styling and accessibility
details: Resolved the outstanding CSS lint violations, refreshed button states, and tightened utility classes so the app ships with a clean, consistent look.

Refined the new account menu into a compact, file-menu inspired widget with role badges, uppercase player names, and a slim character/chronicle/location strip while keeping the changelog button separate.
Reorganized the component tree and moved drawer, modal, badge, and widget styles into colocated CSS modules, trimming the global stylesheet and making future tweaks safer.

summary: Polished the character sheet and chronicle wizard
details: Moved the Character Overview, player session chrome, and chronicle creation wizard styles into dedicated modules so those surfaces render with their intended layout again while keeping the global stylesheet lean.
